attributes.action: authorise the development of the Silver Jubilee Bridge that links Runcorn and Widnes so that it is possible to drive over the top of the compression arch.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By developing an extra set of lanes that run the over the compression arch of the bridge we will be able to half traffic congestion at peak times. Drivers using the system - 'the Runcorn Twidge' as it shall be known - would be required to sign a legally binding disclaimer in case they fall off and die. They will also be charged a two pound toll to use the 'sky road', however charges will drop as wind velocity rises and this information will be displayed to motorists on massive road side screens.
